WITH Cabs AS (
select c.id as id, c.vehicle_model as model
from cab c where 1=1
AND (lower(c.vehicle_model) LIKE #{searchFilter})
), CabsCount AS ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER () OVER (
ORDER BY id ORDER BY model
ORDER BY id
ASC DESC
) as RowNumber FROM Cabs ) SELECT *, (select COUNT(*) from Cabs) as total
FROM CabsCount
WHERE RowNumber > #{pageCriteria.offset} AND RowNumber <= #{pageCriteria.upperRowBound}
ORDER by RowNumber
